tags: Doctor friendliness,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
I  went to Sure smile on 2nd Jan 2020. I have got my wisdom tooth extraction and root canal treatment. I went to Sure smile with lot of nervousness about the pain that i might get during treatment, but the doctor explained and spoke about treatment clearly, they also say before doing something to your tooth, like we might have little pain now, we get some numbness, we hear some sound now etc, so that we don't panic. I am very much depressed and not happy with the fact that i will loose 2 of my teeth, but somehow really happy the way they treated my tooth. I mean only pain is during giving injection, rest all will be fine, trust me, this doctor Vinod is good. Following doctor's instructions will help u to avoid any complications later.  The other staff are also good, supporting and helpful. I went 4 times in 15 days span for the treatment, Thought there is crowd few times, doctor stays calm and takes time to treat you , never felt he is in hurry!! That is really good !! 
I am very happy with the treatment, its been 15days now, so far so good. Hope everything will be fine later also. Of course its my decision to have a metal crown :( , i thought metal crown will not be harsh on its adjacent tooth, its just yesterday I got crown so may be i should get used to it. u can have ceramic crown if u can afford 2K more. I am still not sure which crown is best. 
Charges/Fees are also normal like any other dental clinic, not expensive or cheep.  
One suggestion is don't go for big chain hospitals for dental treatment even if can claim the treatment charges, no ones pay attention to your pain or what you say. 
Though this Sure smile is not look wise very big clinic, ********* ** **** **** *** much satisfactory. I recommend this highly!!

      Thank you so much Doctor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was painless RCT. Never ever  had experienced such treatment.  Time management is highly disciplined. Their charges as per their treatment with higher end machines are perfectly fine for clients.  Teamwork is awesome. I thankyou everyone for giving me RCT painless treatment. At so much young age I bless Dr Vinod in Jesus name, may  Lord prosper him evenmore in 2024 and upcoming years.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
About 3 years ago, I had a cyst removal in one of my jaws and it's the best solution Doctor Shyam and his team came up with. I have recovered really well from it. They explain the problem really well and make sure you're aware of what's happening to you. I had a bad teeth hygiene as well. Courtesy to him and his team, that's improved as well. My oral health is perfect now.

Recently, I went to him as I want to correct my overbite. That consultation went well.

I would really recommend Doctor Shyam to anyone having any problems with their teeth or oral health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Composite tooth filling,
review:
This is my honest feedback about Dr. Vinod.

He is very nice person, Explains the issue in details. He will not do the procedure in hurry burry, He is very patient.

Clinic is very hygenic, Staff is so nice there.

Costwise, Very reasonable, Not like other dental clinics.

They give all good brand crowns,   I am very happy with the treatment.

You can go without any second thought,

They give a file, where they track all treatments in that, Its good to have such files for our referrence.

Thank you so much Doctor
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a detailed review :)

tags: Wait time,
review: I had booked the appointment for 14dec 10am but then doctor called and said he is not available on 14 and requested to schedule it to 16 dec same time. I reached on 16 dec at there clinic by 1 hr late because of heave traffic at Horamavu signal but they did not accommodate me stating there is another patient who booked this slot wherein that patient came only after I reached there clinic. I don‚Äôt know on what grounds doctor said to see her first and not me. This is very unprofessional behaviour. Even the frontline staff and too unprofessional they can‚Äôt understand English nor speak English. Anyway I never thought to write such a negative review about doctor but this incident have forced me to do so. I am not going to opt further For this clinic or doctor.
reply_text:
Dear Ms. Ritu!

Allow me to elaborate on this issue.

1. Your appointment for 14 Dec sought by you online was rescheduled to 16th on 13th December itself with a personal call. It was due to an emergency and requires no explanation here. Surely that's very professional on our part.
2. Your appointment for 16th December was at 10am and you reached at sharp 12 noon. YOU DIDN'T EVEN MAKE A CALL TO INFORM US THAT YOU WERE RUNNING LATE. Appointments are NOT ON FIRST COME FIRST SERVE BASIS. Certainly you entered the clinic 2 minutes before the other patient. But the other patient was there ON TIME for her appointment which we have to honour. Also the receptionist asked you to wait for FIVE to TEN MINUTES so that the patient who walked in on time could be attended to first. EVEN ON PRACTO A WAIT PERIOD OF 15 MINUTES IS CLEARLY MENTIONED AT THE TIME OF BOOKING THE Appointment. Again that's extremely professional behaviour.

Despite that, we would have loved to accommodate you after those 5-10 minutes had you waited instead of storming out . We can only honour your appointment if you honour it yourself. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Sure Smile Dental Clinic staff are very polite and courteous. Dr.Vinod is the best dentist I have been treated by. He explains the issues and dental treatment very well. He is very friendly so the fear of pain during treatment goes away üòä. He is my family dentist . My Parents are also happy with his treatment. My Root canal issues and dental cavity issues were treated by Dr.Vinod and it was the best treatment. Thank you Doctor. I highly recommend Dr.Vinod *** *** ****** ****** ** ** *** ****
reply_text: Thank you so much for the appreciation :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: For someone who has been scared of dentists from a young age, Dr. Vinod's calm and reassuring attitude towards my dental requirements(braces) put me at ease. Initially my fears lead to many apprehensions during my treatment, but he would patiently listen to me and reason things out, and on many occasions he has been accommodative. I realise now that as a professional Dr. Vinod didn't have to be so patient, but he did so to ensure my comfort. I've had 3 molar extractions and none of them hurt as much as I was told it would, the braces do hurt when it's initially tightened but that's how you know that change is taking place. I was told I needed braces at the age of 14, it took me 10 years to find a dentist I could trust and the wait has been worth it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very happy with all his services which I have taken so far. He is good at his job. He is not one of those ambitious doctors who are keen in exploiting you of your hard-earned money. I am pleased with the outcome of my visits so far. And I visit him for all my family dental needs.
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: We had been to Dr Vinod Pattabiraman with loads of doubt about which braces will be apt for my son's buck tooth and lower jaw protrusion but doc cleared all doubts with ease as he's got sound knowledge about dental complications. We were totally satisfied and commenced the treatment for my son the very same day. He is professionally very efficient and friendly towards patients. I highly recommend him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor and the surgeon and also the hospital staff are very humble. I had been for an impacted wisdom tooth removal surgery. The ease with which they handled the issue without letting know of the pain was wonderful. I had to travel 12 kilometers from my house to the clinic but after all the experience at the clinic, the journey was worth it! Happy to be referred here by one of my mentors.
reply_text: Thank you so much Mrs. Nikhila for being so kind! :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Implant / RCT,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: I got an implant, wisdom tooth extraction, RCT, and fillings done here. There was no pain experienced during the procedures. Doctor is very polite, explained the procedure before starting, kept checking with me at regular intervals to see if there's any pain. He kept me updated of the progress through a procedure on the chair so I know how much is done, and how much is left, and what i should expect next. Would highly recommend Dr Vinod.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Great experience. Friendly staff that walked me through the entire process and explained everything that would take place. My experience was great - and I hate going to the dentist!! I was left with the impression that Dr Vinod really did care about me as a patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

He is very benevolent, cool and calm and talks in a polite manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would like to take an opportunity to thank you my doctor Vinod for helping me on root canal treatment. This is the third time I am visiting him, and I always feel him as my family doctor as always, he treats us very well and spend enough time to understand our concern and always provide a right solution for problem. His experience and his level of understanding details about problem always bring a right solution for a typical problem also.I am always happy and no worries on any of my family dental problems as far as I have my doctor Vinod with me. He never compromises on fitting new cap after root canal treatment, and he check thoroughly and make sure there will be no space for food get struck and in case if he finds any gaps, he try to replace the same.Also, the staff really helps and communicate very well in clinic. I always feel very comfortable to visit the clinic and I strongly recommend for any dental issues Dr Vinod is always a first person to approach.Regards,Kartheek
reply_text: Thank you so much Mr. Kartheek. You are a very patient and positive person and it just rubs on to us as well :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had gone to doctor for my wisdom tooth problem...my left downside wisdom tooth was erupting and giving lot of pain and infection...doctor Vinod told it has to be extracted with surgery....I was very afraid of surgery but all went so smoothly and quickly....thanks to Dr.Vinod ...he is very cool and calm, explains everything thoroughly, also the supporting staff and assistant doctor Shewata all r good....after surgery there is a pain but doctor will prescribe medicines and it will be fine after 4-5 days....actually I had problem with all my four wisdom teeth and hence I got them all removed.Only for down wisdom tooth surgery is needed ..up wisdom tooth can be removed without surgery...surgery is done by dental surgeon and they were also very good....Thanks to all of them.
Wonderful experience. Doctor explained the issue well and handled the filling process very nicely. Thank you Doctor
reply_text: Thank you! You and very kind! :)
